title: Mostly the Honest Truth
description: HarperCollins has bought teacher Jody Little's debut middle grade novel, Mostly the Honest Truth. When 11-year-old Jane ends up in the hospital after an accident with her father, she's taken to Three Boulders, a non-traditional foster home where she waits for him to get out of rehab. There, Jane discovers secrets about herself and the true meaning of family. Publication is slated for winter 2019.
author: Jody J. Little
